name: Ovi Store DRM-Protected Application
summary: Learn about .SIS.DM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Ovi Store applications are usually installed in the background by the Ovi Store online service. However, sometimes users manually download applications and receive a file with the SIS.DM extension. These files can be converted to normal SIS files by deleting the first four lines of the file in a text editor and renaming the file extension to ".sis."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
